title: Teen arrested for homicide
content:
Escambia County Sheriff's deputies arrested Jordan Malik Dumas, 19, and charged him for negligent manslaughter, weapons offense and destruction of evidence for the death of a juvenile. Dumas is being held at the Escambia County Jail with no bond.
Deputies responded to the 800 block of Montclair Road on Sunday in reference to a possible suicide, but after further investigation, the Sheriff's Office determined Dumas shot and killed the juvenile.
